metadata.name: Suspicious Execution via macOS Script Editor
metadata.comment: Detects when the macOS Script Editor utility spawns an unusual child process.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/script editor')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/curl')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/bash')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sh')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/zsh')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dash')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/fish')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/osascript')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/mktemp')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/chmod')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/php')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nohup')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/openssl')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/plutil')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/plistbuddy')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/xattr')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sqlite')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/funzip')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/popen'))) AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('python')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('perl'))))

output.summary: Detects when the macOS Script Editor utility spawns an unusual child process.
